document.full_text: zynga, the online game company behind "farmville" and "mafia wars," said on monday jeffrey katzenberg, chief executive of dreamworks animation skg inc has joined its board.
document.title: dreamworks' katzenberg joins zynga board
lines_and_colors: zynga, the online game company behind "farmville" and "mafia wars," said on monday jeffrey katzenberg, chief executive of dreamworks animation skg inc has joined its board.
